effect.cataclysm_spellbooks.abyssal_pred: Grants increased speed, swim speed and damage in water or in rain.
effect.cataclysm_spellbooks.incapacitate: The player is unable to move their head, as well as having slowed movement.
effect.cataclysm_spellbooks.abyssal_gnaw: The amount of time an Abyssal Gnawer remains in the world.
effect.cataclysm_spellbooks.wrathful_eff: The player is filled with wrath that increases their damage per hit.
effect.cataclysm_spellbooks.crab_timer.d: The amount of time an summoned Amethyst Crab remains in the world.
effect.cataclysm_spellbooks.shutdown_eff: The player is unable to use items or attack, damaging them in the process.
effect.cataclysm_spellbooks.rewired_effe: Increases damage and movement speed but inversely reduces armor and armor toughness.
effect.cataclysm_spellbooks.software_upd: Increases speed and reduces spell cooldown.
effect.cataclysm_spellbooks.intrusion_de: Reduces projectile damage and prevents summons from being counterspelled.
effect.cataclysm_spellbooks.mana_overcha: Increased mana and Technomancy spell power.
effect.cataclysm_spellbooks.spell_res_ov: Increased spell resistance and Technomancy spell power.
effect.cataclysm_spellbooks.cooldown_ove: Decreased spell cooldown and increased Technomancy spell power.
item.cataclysm_spellbooks.burning_manusc: When in inventory, unlocks all Ignis spells
item.cataclysm_spellbooks.frozen_tablet_: When in inventory, unlocks all Maledictus spells
item.cataclysm_spellbooks.excelsius_helm: Press %s to give nearby entities the Guided effect and increasing your projectile damage by 2x
item.cataclysm_spellbooks.excelsius_ches: Elytra flight capabilities without any limitations on fuel or boosts
item.cataclysm_spellbooks.excelsius_legg: Any fall damage that would be taken is nullified
item.cataclysm_spellbooks.excelsius_boot: Press %s to get a jump boost, igniting nearby entities on fire
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.void_beam.gui: Cast an abyssal beam at your chosen target
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.void_rune.gui: Cast void rune at your chosen target
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.abyssal_slash: Slash your at your target dealing melee damage
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.abyssal_blast: Unleash a devastating blast that damages blocks and inflicts abyssal burn
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.abyssal_preda: Cast a spell that increases your swim speed, attack damage, and attack speed. You gain more damage while underwater
Summon various depth charge mines in a radius around you
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.conjure_abyss: Summon a school of Abyssal Gnawers from another dimension to your aid
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.tidal_grab.gu: Cast a tentacle from your grasp to damage targets
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.infernal_stri: Shoot out a minature Incinerator to damage your targets and inflict Blazing Brand on them
Summon flame strikes in a straight line in front of the caster
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.conjure_ignit: Conjure Ignited Revenants and Berserkers to your aid
Spew ashen breath on your opponents
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.bone_storm.gu: Launch a swirling bone storm from yourself. The higher the speed, the farther the spread
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.piercing_bone: Launch a blazing bone at your opponent, and afterwards a small burts of 3 bones spread from you
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.hellish_blade: Summon a replicate of the Incinerator above your opponent, striking them and applying stun and Blazing Brand on hit
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.abyss_firebal: Summon a torrent of bouncing fireballs that change depending on your health, dealing Blazing Brand on hit
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.amethyst_punc: Launch an amethyst cluster at your opponent
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.gravity_storm: Conjure a void vortex where you are looking to devastate targets
Conjure void runes around yourself to injure attackers in your radius
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.gravitation_p: Reel in entities towards yourself by manipulating gravity around yourself
Summon a smaller sandstorm that damages mobs in front of you
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.monolith_cras: Conjure several monoliths above you that crash around you and your foes
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.malevolent_ba: Conjure several phantom halberds around yourself, dealing massive amounts of damage to entities caught nearby
Fill yourself with a chilling rage that increases your damage as you attack entities. You are weakened afterwards once your wrath ends
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.conjure_kobol: Conjure the powerful Koboldiator to your aid
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.pilfer.guide: Cast a spell that rips away the item held in the target's hand
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.summon_kobole: Conjure a group of Koboletons to fight by your side
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.cursed_rush.g: Rush in the direction you're looking in, summoning phantom halberds at both your original and new destination. Any entity caught in your path will be damaged
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.conjure_thral: Conjure a group of undead draugur to fight by your side
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.tectonic_trem: Shake the earth, igniting nearby entites and knocking them back
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.conjure_ameth: Conjure the mythical Amethyst Crab to fight by your side
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.laserbolt.gui: Target an entity and shoot out a small laser bolt in their direction
Fire a devastating laser in the direction you are looking it, incapacitating you
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.emp_blast.gui: Emit an EMP pulse from yourself, stunning nearby mobs
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.lock_on.guide: Target an entity, displaying a target above their head and stunning them for a short period of time
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.construct_wat: Construct a group of Watchers to aid you in combat
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.construct_pro: Construct a Prowler to aid you in combat
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.ddos.guide: Disrupt services around you, dispelling summons and removing magic effects from nearby entities
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.dos_swarm.gui: Summon a group of Watchers which attack any nearby mobs on sight, dispelling any magic properties from the target and exploding on impact
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.shutdown.guid: Shutdown the target's processes, preventing them from attacking or using items
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.rewire.guide: Rewire your summons' capabilities, increasing their speed and damage, but inversely decreasing their armor and toughness
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.hardware_upda: Update your internals with new hardware, increasing your armor and attack damage. Does not stack with Charge, Haste, or Software Update
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.software_upda: Update your internals with new software, increasing your speed and reducing your spell cooldown. Does not stack with Charge, Haste, or Hardware Update
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.missile_launc: Target an entity and launch a barrage Homing Wither Missiles at them
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.aerial_assaul: Launch an aerial assault of Wither Missiles around you
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.intrusion_pre: Enforce yourself and your nearby summon with IPS, preventing projectile damage and preventing your summons from being counterspelled
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.overcharged.g: Overcharge your systems, boosting your capabilities beyond normal limits. Has unique interactions with certain items
Charge up your weapon, unleashing two powerful lasers that inflict Wither on hit
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.surveillance_: Construct a surveillance drone on top of your summons, healing you and nearby summons
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.flash_bang.gu: Throw a non-lethal flash bang, blinding nearby entities
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.disabling_swi: Swipe at your target's hardware, briefly preventing any incoming healing on hit
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.gear_shift.gu: While standing, briefly dash forwards. While crouching, dash upwards
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.reboot.guide: Reboot your systems, healing yourself and nearby allies
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.phantasmal_bl: Slam your weapon in the ground, shooting out phantom axe blades around you
Shower flare bombs from yourself, creating flare jets wherever they land
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.meteor_spew.g: Eject clumps of molten rock and lava in the direction you are looking in, spawning lava on impact
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.conjure_coral: Conjure a group of coral golems to fight by your side
Conjure a Coralssus to ride and fight by your side
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.thoths_witnes: With the blessing of Thoth, call forth the spirit of The Ancient Remnant to fight by your side briefly
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.pharaohs_wrat: Fill yourself with a heated rage that increases your damage and spell power as you take hits. You are weakened afterwards once your wrath ends
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.void_beam: Summon an abyssal beam similar to the Deepling warlocks
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.void_rune: Summon an void rune at your target's location
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.dimensional_rift: Summon a dimensional rift that lasts for %d seconds
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.incinerator_dama: Deals %d if Incinerator is held in the main hand
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.fireball_details: Below half health turns the firball into soul fire, at below 30% health into an abyss fireball
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.recast_count: Can cast this spell %d times in succession before cooldown
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.amethyst_speed: Launches Amethyst Clusters at %d projectile speed
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.gravity_storm.li: Summon a void vortex that lasts for %d seconds
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.gravitation: While standing, drag entities in. While crouching, push entities away
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.sandstorm.lifesp: Summon a sandstorm that lasts for %d seconds
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.sandstorm_amount: Summons %d sandstorms the circle around the user
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.soul_render_dama: Deals %d if Soul Render is held in the main hand
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.forgone_rage_str: Each consecutive strike increases damage by 20%, maxing out at four strikes
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.pilfer_priority: Prioritizes offhand items before mainhand items to be stolen
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.halberd_rush: Spawns halberds at starting location and occasionally at end location
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.maledictus_armor: Deals %d if Soul Render or Annihilator is held in the main hand
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.underwater_damag: Deal bonus damage while underwater or in rain
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.kings_wrath_stri: Each consecutive hit taken increases damage by 20% and spell power by 5%, maxing out at four hits
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.thoths_witness_s: Thoth will not allow you to cast this from a measly scroll
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.thoths_witness_a: You lack the required armory to receive Thoth's miracle; adorn yourself with the pharaoh's armor
death.attack.cataclysm_spellbooks.summon: %1$s was bashed in by %2$s's ignited revenants
%1$s was hacked to death by %2$s's Koboldeton
%1$s was crunched between %2$s's Amethyst Crab's claws
death.attack.cataclysm_spellbooks.survei: %1$s was somehow killed by %2$s's passive surveillance drone
death.attack.cataclysm_spellbooks.disabl: %1$s had their hardwire torn by %2$s's disabling swipe
death.attack.cataclysm_spellbooks.no_man: %1$s was reduced to nothing in %2$s's No Man's Zone
death.attack.blazing_aoe.item: %1$s was immolated in %2$s's blazing field while using %3$s
death.attack.no_man_zone_aoe.item: %1$s was reduced to nothing in %2$s's No Man's Zone while using %3$s
death.attack.cataclysm_spellbooks.hellis: %1$s was gored by %2$s's hellish blade using %3$s
death.attack.cataclysm_spellbooks.infern: %1$s was pierced by %2$s's infernal blade using %3$s
death.attack.cataclysm_spellbooks.summon: %1$s was bashed in by %2$s's ignited revenants using %3$s
%1$s was cleaved by %2$s's ignited berserkers using %3$s
death.attack.cataclysm_spellbooks.partin: %1$s was atomized by %2$s's parted shot while using %3$s
death.attack.cataclysm_spellbooks.survei: %1$s was somehow killed by %2$s's passive surveillance drone using %3$s
death.attack.cataclysm_spellbooks.disabl: %1$s had their hardwire torn by %2$s's disabling swipe using %3$s
